first-greeting.speaker: Lionfish
first-greeting.text: Oh? A surface-dweller wandering this deep? You're either brave or foolish.

options.text: Maybe both. Who are you?
I'm just exploring. Why? Who are you?
Should I be scared?
Who are you?
Am I in danger?

explain1.speaker: Lionfish
explain1.text: These waters have many branching paths. Those unfamiliar don't tend to last long.

explain1.speaker: Lionfish
explain1.text: Without a proper guide you'll likely parish if you dare explore to far.

explain1.speaker: Lionfish
explain1.text: You'd stay put if you know whats best for you.

options.text: Who are you?
It can't be that bad if cute fish like you are down here.

intro1.speaker: Lionfish
intro1.text: They call me the Bubbles… but names don't matter much down here.

options.text: I think Bubbles is a beautiful name.
Bubbles suits you.

fluster1.speaker: Lionfish
fluster1.text: W-what?@ Don't say things like that so easily… it's embarrassing.

options.text: Did I make you blush?
Sorry, I didn't mean to.
Heh. You're cute when you're flustered.

soft1.speaker: Lionfish
soft1.text: Well you better watch what you say, ok!

soft1.speaker: Lionfish
soft1.text: ...You cant just say things like that.

options.text: Can you help me find my way around here?

norizz1.speaker: Lionfish
norizz1.text: W-what?@ I barely know you.@ What do I look like to you? some sort of tour guide?

norizz1.speaker: Lionfish
norizz1.text: I'm not just going to stand around giving directions all day. I've got better things to do then wast anymore time no you.@ Get lost.

tease2.speaker: Lionfish
tease2.text: N-no! Fish don't blush!@ It's just… the reflection of the coral, okay?

options.text: If you say so, coral cheeks.
Alright, alright. Coral reflection. Got it.

tease3.speaker: Lionfish
tease3.text: C-cute...@ How can you say something like that?@ I'm not flustered!!!

options.text: Alright, alright. not flustered. Got it.

bond1.speaker: Lionfish
bond1.text: Hmph. You're insufferable… but maybe not entirely unpleasant.

options.text: I'll take that as a compliment.
Coming from you, that's high praise.

introhint.speaker: Lionfish
introhint.text: You keep talking about compliments. Do you think words are all it takes to impress me?

options.text: Then what *does* impress you?
I bet I could find something shiny enough to change your mind.

pearlhint.speaker: Lionfish
pearlhint.text: Shiny things... maybe@ ...N-not that I care about that sort of thing. Pearls, maybe. But only because they reflect the moonlight nicely. That's all!

options.text: So you *do* like pearls.
Moonlight and pearls… sounds poetic.

rubyhint.speaker: Lionfish
rubyhint.text: Shiny things... maybe@ ...N-not that I care about that sort of thing. Rubies, maybe. But only because there reflective red glow goes nicely with my fins. That's all!

options.text: So you *do* like rubies.
I can imagine rubies would go nicely with your style.

soft2.speaker: Lionfish
soft2.text: Don't think you can charm me with shiny talk, surface-dweller. I'm not that easy.

soft2.speaker: Lionfish
soft2.text: But… keep talking like that, and I might start to believe you mean it.

options.text: Maybe you like me more than you think.

fluster2.speaker: Lionfish
fluster2.text: I-I didn't say that! Stop twisting my words! It's not like I like you or your dumb gifts or anything!

options.text: Sure, sure. Totally not.

bond2.speaker: Lionfish
bond2.text: You're impossible… maybe that's why I can't stop talking to you.

options.text: Maybe you like me more than you think.
That sounds like a compliment.

ending_hint.speaker: Lionfish
ending_hint.text: Hmph. Don't get cocky.@ Bring me something that I like, and *maybe* I'll help you get around…

dead_pearl.speaker: Lionfish
dead_pearl.text: What is this?! A PEARL!@ I hate pearls!@ I don't want to hear anything you have to say! Get lost

dead_end.speaker: Lionfish
dead_end.text: Get lost!@ I dont want to hear anything you have to say!
